as.description: The element or component the Combobox should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the Combobox should render as.

defaultValue.description: The default value when using as an uncontrolled component.
defaultValue.description_zh: The default value when using as an uncontrolled component.

by.type: keyof T | ((a: T, z: T) => boolean)
by.description:
Use this to compare objects by a particular field, or pass your own
comparison function for complete control over how objects are compared.
by.description_zh:
Use this to compare objects by a particular field, or pass your own
comparison function for complete control over how objects are compared.

onChange.description: The function to call when a new option is selected.
onChange.description_zh: The function to call when a new option is selected.

name.description: The name used when using this component inside a form.
name.description_zh: The name used when using this component inside a form.

nullable.description: Whether you can clear the combobox or not.
nullable.description_zh: Whether you can clear the combobox or not.

multiple.description: Whether multiple options can be selected or not.
multiple.description_zh: Whether multiple options can be selected or not.

:open.description: Whether or not the combobox is open.
:open.description_zh: Whether or not the combobox is open.

:disabled.description: Whether or not the combobox is disabled.
:disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the combobox is disabled.

:activeIndex.description: The index of the active option or null if none is active.
:activeIndex.description_zh: The index of the active option or null if none is active.

:activeOption.description: The active option or null if none is active.
:activeOption.description_zh: The active option or null if none is active.
